ValidationRule.description: BODEV-1813: Only One Activated Order Per Opp Pending
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( Status ), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Activated"), Account.Order_sync_pending__c=TRUE, NOT(CONTAINS( $User.Id,"005U00000034ZKA")), NOT( CONTAINS( $User.Id,"0053g000000htF8")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: There is another order pending to be synced to NetSuite for this account. Please try to activate it again in a few minutes.
